plot: An insight into the torment one man undergoes in search of those elusive, taunting raspberries. "Vous avez vu les framboises?".
title: Les framboises
plot_es: An insight into the torment one man undergoes in search of those elusive, taunting raspberries. "Vous avez vu les framboises?".
plot_en: An insight into the torment one man undergoes in search of those elusive, taunting raspberries. "Vous avez vu les framboises?".
